description:
Do you know who you're exactly selling to?

If you answered something like: women, small business owners, teenangers or mothers...

...then you're probably not selling to anybody

Truly understanding your target market is one of the most important things when it comes to starting to market and sell products online.

Only by having a clear idea in your mind of who you would like to reach, sell to or help you can tailor and target your messages and have the strong impact on your target audience.

This is the secret to success in the online world.

So how do you get information about your customer and have a deep understanding of what they desire and what they fear the most?

By creating a customer avatar.

The customer avatar means is identifying your best customer – the person most likely to buy from you time and again and respond to your marketing with the greatest enthusiasm.
title: Customer Avatar – Attract Your Target Market & Sell More
